creator: jansen@hbz-nrw.de
text:
Build 2.1.8-beta with
"./configure" \
"--prefix=/opt/apache_2.1" \
"--enable-modules=all" \
"--enable-mods-shared=all" \
"--enable-proxy" \
"--enable-proxy-connect" \
"--enable-proxy-http" \
"--enable-proxy-balancer" \
"--enable-rewrite" \
"--enable-so" \
"--enable-info--enable-cache" \
"--enable-mem-cache" \
"--with-mpm=worker"

Getting error when loading mod_mem_cache as DSO:
tron:/opt/apache_2.1 # bin/apachectl configtest
httpd: Syntax error on line 66 of /opt/apache_2.1/conf/httpd.conf: Cannot load
/opt/apache_2.1/modules/mod_mem_cache.so into server:
/opt/apache_2.1/modules/mod_mem_cache.so: undefined symbol:
ap_cache_cacheable_hdrs_out

creator: jansen@hbz-nrw.de
text:
Sorry, should have read my own post more carefully:
"--enable-info--enable-cache"!!
Forget about it!
